valmo.geco.model
Class Registry

java.lang.Object
  valmo.geco.model.Registry

public class Registry
extends java.lang.Object

Registry holds all data related to the stage itself and provides a facade to access them. It does not hold properties related to the application (controls, widgets). It should evolve towards an interface masking the persistence framework (database). Currently, Registry is also able to perform some batch operations on itself.

Since:
Jan 4, 2009
